data.name: Reality Incognita Demo
data.detailed_description:
Update Notes

UPDATE: Demo 0.7.4.3 is out!
---Hotfix changes from 0.7.4.2---
Moving mouse over both the cat and surrounding food in "Pantry" now show correct text
Bug in conversation with Robot Butler - all threads were leading to same answer - now fixed
Incorrect symbols in conversation - now fixed.
https://steamcommunity.com/app/604550/discussions/0/1326718197228420101/

Now, I will concentrate on early access version.
Early Access 0.8 - will have a new story arc, total three story arcs. For this time, they will still be separate. New story arc will include 5 new areas - all located on Lower Deck of the ship.
Early Access version 0.8 will be available for the greatly reduced cost.

Estimated update: July, 2016.

Place for discussions: http://steamcommunity.com/app/604550/discussions/


About the Game

Peri Res has woken up unexpectedly in a place that resembles anything but her daily routine. Upon closer inspection she discovers it’s an eerie space vessel bound for the unknown. Finding out why her current predicament is happening sets out to be our protagonist primary goal. The quest to determine and discover forthcoming events is unfortunately riddled with suspense and many dangers wait. To make matters worse the ship is constantly being sabotaged and her efforts are proving ever more difficult. Time is not on her side as she races to find out why she has been brought to this strange and vast spacefaring vessel.

Our story will dabble in humor at times, with many twists and turns that are sure to keep even the most demanding adventures satisfied. Be prepared for a thrilling experience that is sure to keep you guessing with an engaging narrative and tons of surprises. You are going to be on the edge of your seat from start to finish.

DEMO: Two story arcs on nine game areas.

Place for discussions: http://steamcommunity.com/app/604550/discussions/

data.short_description: A sci-fi adventure, that keeps you in suspense, but yet hilarious

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP / Windows Vista / Windows 7 / Windows 8/ Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.8GHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Mac not supported
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP / Windows Vista / Windows 7 / Windows 8/ Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.16GHz
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 2048MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Mac not supported

data.legal_notice: Reality Incognita ® is an officially registered trademark

highlighted.name: A sound mind in a clean body
Ostap is dead, but his business lives on
